attributes.action: Make those working in the education sector exempt from high price holidays.
attributes.additional_details: As a Teacher I am unable to take Annual Leave during term time. Due to holiday companies boosting their prices during these periods it makes it impossible for many families with those working in education to afford holidays. I am petitioning for those who work in education to recieve discount on adult holiday prices due to not having the choice in taking time off during other parts of the year where prices are lower.
attributes.background: I want those working in the education sector to recieve discounts on adult tickets during peak time holidays due to being unable to take time off during term time.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Ban holiday companies from charging higher prices in the school holidays
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/730119
